channel.title: Auxy tee shirts: Bring them back!
channel.description: Hey fellow Auxy users! Wouldn’t it be awesome if there was an Auxy _shirt_ you could get online? Well... there used to be. In fact, the link to the purchase page would be this: https://cottonbureau.com/products/auxy But for now the makers of the shirt aren’t selling them anymore. @Auxy, is there _any_ chance these shirts could be sold again, and if not, what would it take to bring them back?

item.title: Auxy tee shirts: Bring them back!
item.dc:creator: VJM
item.description:
Hey fellow Auxy users!
Wouldn’t it be awesome if there was an Auxy shirt you could get online? Well… there used to be. In fact, the link to the purchase page would be this:

Cotton Bureau

Auxy by Auxy

A mobile studio for the new generation of music producers and a great graphic tee. Black and royal color options. Water-based application.


But for now the makers of the shirt aren’t selling them anymore. @Auxy, is there any chance these shirts could be sold again, and if not, what would it take to bring them back?

Read full topic
item.source: Auxy tee shirts: Bring them back!
